verses.roman:
āpyāyayaty asau lokaṁ
vadanāmṛta-mūrtinā
sānurāgāvalokena
viśada-smita-cāruṇā

synonyms: āpyāyayati—enhances; asau—he; lokam—the whole world; vadana—by his face; amṛta-mūrtinā—moonlike; sa-anurāga—affectionate; avalokena—with glances; viśada—bright; smita—smiling; cāruṇā—beautiful.
translation: This King, Pṛthu Mahārāja, by virtue of his affectionate glances and beautiful moonlike face, which is always smiling with great affection for the citizens, will enhance everyone's peaceful life.
